content.title: Grant For Organizing Conference
content.department: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
content.details: The scheme provides financial assistance for organizing national and international conferences.
eligibility: Institutions that have not received funding for a conference in the last two financial years
content.application_process: Online submission through the AICTE portal.

faqs.question: How can I apply for the grant?
faqs.answer: Applications can be submitted online through the AICTE portal.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: Institutions recognized by AICTE and those that have not received funding for a conference in the last two financial years are eligible.
